title: Content Showcase
shortDescription: Announce important news, latest updates, special offers, ...
longDescription:
**Content Showcase** app allows highlighting important pieces of content to engage your users or visitors when they browse your pages. 

For instance, you can use it to announce:

- üìù blog posts,
- üåü product updates,
- üí∏ giveaways and coupons,
- üë®‚Äçüè´Ô∏è webinars,
- üìÜ event registrations,
- üìí surveys,
- üë• job opportunities,
- üìÜ maintenances,
- üê± product hunt featuring,
- üç™ GDPR compliance for cookie consent, 
- and more

Announcements are displayed in a nice and fully customizable popup. You can change colors, texts, styles, and position but also configure behaviors: displaying the popup after a given date and time, loading it on specific pages, after a given delay, and even make it expire after a given date and time. 

The app also integrates with Google Analytics to measure your Click-Through-Rate (CTR) performance: impressions and clicks.

With Content Showcase, you will improve user engagement, convert more customers but also get more clicks and views in a few minutes.

Last but not least, setup and configuration require no coding knowledge!
author: Laurent Pellegrino

proposedApp.title: Content Showcase
proposedApp.shortDescription: Make announcement popups that convert visitors
proposedApp.longDescription:
**Content Showcase** app allows highlighting important pieces of content to engage your users or visitors when they browse your pages. 

For instance, you can use it to announce:

- üìù blog posts,
- üåü product updates,
- üí∏ giveaways and coupons,
- üë®‚Äçüè´Ô∏è webinars,
- üìÜ event registrations,
- üìí surveys,
- üë• job opportunities,
- üìÜ maintenances,
- üê± product hunt featuring,
- üç™ GDPR compliance for cookie consent, 
- and more

Announcements are displayed in a nice and fully customizable popup. You can change colors, texts, styles, and position but also configure behaviors: displaying the popup after a given date and time, loading it on specific pages, after a given delay, and even make it expire after a given date and time. 

The app also integrates with Google Analytics to measure your Click-Through-Rate (CTR) performance: impressions and clicks.

With Content Showcase, you will improve user engagement, convert more customers but also get more clicks and views in a few minutes.

Last but not least, setup and configuration require no coding knowledge!

With Content Showcase, you will improve user engagement, convert more customers but also get more clicks and views in a few minutes.

Last but not least, setup and configuration require no coding knowledge!
